option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
# MonsterBattle configuration # Shared seed for all generated Farm_<team> worlds. # Set to -1 to reuse the seed of the first loaded (main) world. world-seed: -1
# Name of the already existing template world to clone for each team during battle phase. arena-template-world: Arena
# Whether each team should have their own Nether/End for Farm_*/Arena_* worlds separate-dimensions: true # Whether to also create The End for each separated base world create-end-dimensions: true
# Monster spawner settings monster-spawner: # If true, a cycle will attempt to spawn ALL pending kills (round-robin over spawn points) spawn-all-on-cycle: false # If spawn-all-on-cycle is false, cap number of spawns per cycle (-1 means use number of spawn points) max-spawn-per-cycle: -1 # Tick interval between spawn cycles (20 ticks = 1s). Default 60 (3 seconds) tick-interval: 60
# If true, players' respawn (bed) location is set to their arena world spawn when battle phase starts set-arena-respawn: true # If true, players' respawn (bed) location is set to their farm world spawn when farming phase starts set-farm-respawn: true

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# MonsterBattle configuration # Shared seed for all generated Farm_<team> worlds. # Set to -1 to reuse the seed of the first loaded (main) world. world-seed: -1
# Name of the already existing template world to clone for each team during battle phase. arena-template-world: Arena
# Whether each team should have their own Nether/End for Farm_*/Arena_* worlds separate-dimensions: true # Whether to also create The End for each separated base world create-end-dimensions: true
# Monster spawner settings monster-spawner: # If true, a cycle will attempt to spawn ALL pending kills (round-robin over spawn points) spawn-all-on-cycle: false # If spawn-all-on-cycle is false, cap number of spawns per cycle (-1 means use number of spawn points) max-spawn-per-cycle: -1 # Tick interval between spawn cycles (20 ticks = 1s). Default 60 (3 seconds) tick-interval: 60
# If true, players' respawn (bed) location is set to their arena world spawn when battle phase starts set-arena-respawn: true # If true, players' respawn (bed) location is set to their farm world spawn when farming phase starts set-farm-respawn: true
